title: thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value', compiler/rustc_metadata/src/rmeta/def_path_hash_map.rs:23:85

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: S-has-mcve
labels.description: A Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example has been found for this issue

body:
### Code

Unfortunately I don't have a minimal reproduction for this 😞 

https://github.com/Turbo87/crates.io/tree/ice (e6a7ce4957cc7f9cb8bffd2f0e8857744be64188) is the state of the repo at the time where it happened.

### Meta
<!--
If you're using the stable version of the compiler, you should also check if the
bug also exists in the beta or nightly versions.
-->

`rustc --version --verbose`:
```
rustc 1.63.0 (4b91a6ea7 2022-08-08)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: 4b91a6ea7258a947e59c6522cd5898e7c0a6a88f
commit-date: 2022-08-08
host: x86_64-apple-darwin
release: 1.63.0
LLVM version: 14.0.5
```

### Error output

```

error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic
note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.
note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md
note: rustc 1.63.0 (4b91a6ea7 2022-08-08) running on x86_64-apple-darwin

note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden
query stack during panic:
#0 [type_op_prove_predicate] evaluating `type_op_prove_predicate` `Canonical { max_universe: U0, variables: [CanonicalVarInfo { kind: Region(U0) }], value: ParamEnvAnd { param_env: ParamEnv { caller_bounds: [], reveal: UserFacing, constness: NotConst }, value: ProvePredicate { predicate: Binder(TraitPredicate(<diesel::query_builder::update_statement::UpdateStatement<cargo_registry::schema::versions::table, diesel::query_builder::where_clause::WhereClause<diesel::expression::operators::Eq<cargo_registry::schema::versions::columns::id, diesel::expression::bound::Bound<diesel::sql_types::Integer, &i32>>>, diesel::query_builder::update_statement::changeset::Assign<cargo_registry::schema::versions::columns::yanked, diesel::expression::bound::Bound<diesel::sql_types::Bool, bool>>> as diesel::query_builder::AsQuery>, polarity:Positive), []) } } }`
```
